name: deposit_funds
attributes: # [doc = " ギルドバンクに資金を入金するが、"]
# [doc = " bank_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の照合チェックがない"]
body: let bank = & mut ctx . accounts . bank_account ;
bank . balance = bank . balance . checked_add (amount) . unwrap () ;
* * ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= amount ;
* * ctx . accounts . bank_treasury . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += amount ;

fields.name: bank_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を指定して所有者照合を行うべき"]

fields.name: bank_treasury
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ギルドの財務を管理する口座（Lamports保管先）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 入金を実行するユーザー（署名者）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このバンクを操作できるギルドリーダーの Pubkey"]
